about_the_game:
The most chaotic parade in the universe!

Samba Space Parade is an action puzzle game about music and fun. You need to take your parade to the end of the course, avoiding crazy obstacles. You can collect cute musicians to play different songs accross dozen planets. Try to keep them alive while they are walking and playing. Upgrade them and try to beat the highscores!

Highlights

  • Progressive difficult action puzzles
  • Enjoy original sound track composed exclusively for the game.
  • Go through dozens of levels in beautiful 2D scenarios.
  • Admire the charming hand-crafted animations.
  • Gain gold to unlock new musicians
  • Explore the universe to find new planets and songs to your parade

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210M
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

name: Samba Space Parade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Take your parade to the end of the universe. Samba Space Parade is an action puzzle game full of cute characters and quirky music. Recruit new players, upgrade members, and earn money as you tour the galaxy, aiming for the highest scores and entertaining the cutest alien audiences.
